prompts: Create a legendary Dragon-type Pokemon that can soar high in the sky with sleek wings.
Imagine a Psychic Pokemon with a stunning purple body and unique silver accents.
Show me a majestic creature that embodies the essence of flight and power.
Design a mythical Pokemon that has an ethereal appearance and can manipulate psychic energy.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a futuristic dragon with a streamlined design and vibrant colors.
Make a captivating Pokemon with an elegant form, gliding effortlessly through the air.
Give me a Pokemon that represents speed and intelligence, with striking purple and silver features.
